Text: This is an under-rated movie.  Great film noir with Annette Benning, John Cusack, and Anjelica Huston.  The soundtrack by Elmer Bernstein is wonderful.  Well worth watching.

Just as YowzaTheBear said this is indeed an under rated movie.  I was watching Confidence and at the end of it I thought what is another good confidence or grifter movie besides The Sting and I remember Grifters which is a classic when it comes to con movies.  

Thanks for the upload.

Thanks.
